thread.title: New York City Mayor Plans To Spend $500,000 To Thwart Election Hackers

author: Mara Gay
title: New York City Mayor Plans To Spend $500,000 To Thwart Election Hackers

organizations.name: thwart election hackers new york city mayor bill de blasio

text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio plans to spend $500,000 this year to protect the city’s election system against hackers—a step he says is necessary as investigations continue into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.
The effort would focus on improving cybersecurity at the city’s Board of Elections, de Blasio administration officials said.
